import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List users"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/users"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



List users with optional filtering, sorting, and infinite scroll pagination.
Uses scrollId-based pagination for efficient navigation through large datasets.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"X-Request-Id","in":"header","description":"Optional request identifier for tracking","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"pageSize","in":"query","description":"Number of items per page (default: 100)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","example":100}},{"name":"scrollId","in":"query","description":"Scroll identifier for retrieving the next page of results","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"filter","in":"query","description":"RSQL filter expression (e.g., 'basicInfo.userName==jane.doe@corp.com', 'basicInfo.status==ACTIVE')","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"basicInfo.status==ACTIVE"}},{"name":"sort","in":"query","description":"Sort expression. Use '+' prefix or no prefix for ascending order, '-' prefix for descending order (e.g., 'basicInfo.userName', '+basicInfo.userName', or '-basicInfo.userName')","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"basicInfo.userName"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
